name: Lansinoh - mOmma Rocking Feeding 8.4-oz Baby Bottle, BPA-Free

reviews.name: Lansinoh - mOmma Rocking Feeding 8.4-oz Baby Bottle, BPA-Free
reviews.reviewText: After my breastfed baby refused other bottles, we tried this one. He loves it! It looks like a breast, is comfortable to hold, and the nipple seems "softer & smoother" then other bottles we tried. I guess since a breastfeeding company makes it, they tried to get close to "the real thing." :) The only drawback, it's a little harder to heat the bottle since the milk is in more of a concentrated area but you can always just warm it up in the storage bags, then pour in.
reviews.title: great bottle for breastfed baby

reviews.name: Lansinoh - mOmma Rocking Feeding 8.4-oz Baby Bottle, BPA-Free
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many bottles for both of my daughters, who had nipple confusion. This one is amazing!! I had to go back to work and this was my last option... she took it first try. The nipple is extremely soft to the touch and she holds the bottle the same way she holds me. It's perfect!
reviews.title: Saved my life!

reviews.name: Lansinoh - mOmma Rocking Feeding 8.4-oz Baby Bottle, BPA-Free
reviews.reviewText: I love the color and sytle they are like no other i love them
reviews.title: Momma bottles
